# From ChatGpt
name: Testing
on: push

jobs:
  test_project:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      
      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v2
        with:
          python-version: '3.12.2' # Specify your Python version

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install django

      - name: Run Django unit tests
        run: |
          python manage.py test

# From Demo
name: Testing
on: push

jobs:
  test_project:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      
      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v2
        with:
          python-version: '3.12.2' # Specify your Python version

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install django

      - name: Run Django unit tests
        run: |
          python manage.py test
